mapper.select:
select a.id, u.name as owner, a.name, a.startDate, a.endDate, a.cost, a.description, a.createTime, a.createBy, a.editTime, a.editBy from tbl_activity as a
join tbl_user as u
on a.owner = u.id
where a.id=#{id}
mapper.update: update tbl_activity set owner = #{owner}, name = #{name}, cost = #{cost}, description = #{description}, editTime = #{editTime}, editBy = #{editBy} where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_activity( id, owner, name, startDate, endDate, cost, description, createTime, createBy )values( #{id}, #{owner}, #{name}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{cost}, #{description}, #{createTime}, #{createBy} )
